titleStmt.title: SII 14.215: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 215. (A.R. No. 321 of 1908.) KURUVITTUṞAI, NILAKKOTTAI TALUK, MADURAI DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SHRINE IN THE CHITRARATHAVALLABHA-PERUMĀḶ TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription is dated in the 7th year of Śrīvallabha. Tiruvaraṅgaṉ-Peṟṟatiru, wife of Appaṉ-Īśvaraṉ, made a gift of gold for providing offerings to the god Uyyakkoṇḍāḷvār set up by her in the temple of Paramasvāmin who was pleased to stand in Tiruchchakkara-tīrtham in Pāgaṉūr-kūṟṟam.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumaṭantaiyum jayamaṭantaiyum tiruppuyaṅkaḷi liṉitiruppa Eṇṭicaiyum kuṭai niḻaṟṟa Irunilamum perumaiyeyta maṉṉava rellām vantiṟaiñcu marapilen varu muṭicūṭi teṉkumariyum vaṭakaṅkaiyum ti� lume yellaiyāka pār muḻutuṅ kayalāṇai parantu ceṅkoluṭaṉ vaḷara maṉṉiya virasiṅhāsaṉattu Ulaka muḻutuṭaiyāroṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷi māmutal matikkulam viḻakkiya komutal koc caṭaiya
panmarāṉa tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīvallavadevaṟku yāṇṭu Ēḻāvatu pākaṉūrkkūṟṟattu tiruccakkaradīrtthattu niṉṟaruḷiṉa paramasvāmikaḷ koyilukku śrībali Eḻuntaruḷukaikku neṟkuppai nāṭṭuk keraḷāntakapurattu vyāpāri Appaṉ Īśvaraṉ Akamuṭaiyāḷ tiru varaṅkaṉ peṟṟatiru Eḻuntaruḷuvitta Uyyakkoṇṭāḷvārkku sandhi Oṉṟukku tiruppoṉakattukku Arici nāṉāḻiyum Itukku veṇṭum kaṟiyamutum neyyamutum tayiramutum Aṭaikkāyamutum Ilaiyamutum muṭṭāmal candrā
dittaval celvatāka Itukku nāḷ Oṉṟukku nellu patiṉāḻiyāka Ivvāḷvār śrī paṇṭāratte muṭṭāmal Ivvāḷvār kaṉmikaḷe celuttuvomāka Ivvāḷvār śrīpaṇṭārattu Ivaḷ Oṭukkiḷa cempoṉ paṉṉiru kaḻañcu Ippoṉ paṉirukaḻañcum Oṭukkuvittukkoṇṭamaikku . svasti
Digital edition of SII 14.215 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
